title: playground: ParseFile example at godoc.org cannot be run
body:
`example_test.go` is used for Go example output test.
Is there anyway to make this runnable on golang.org?
If not, please feel free to close this.

Thanks!

> What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

https://golang.org/pkg/go/parser/#example_ParseFile

> What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

https://golang.org/pkg/go/parser/#example_ParseFile

> What did you do?
If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error.

Hit run button at  https://golang.org/pkg/go/parser/#example_ParseFile

> What did you expect to see?

No error.

> What did you see instead?

```
open example_test.go: No such file or directory
```
